author: ianna
body:
* Lock the Stores when asked to do so
* Add a DDCompactView constructor which allows to unlock the Stores. 

Note: The only use case where the Stores need to be unlocked is the MagneticField geometry producer.

This is a new PR is based on https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/24355 and addresses https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/24355#discussion_r211944953
title: DD Store Lock
